#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#define maxn 100010
#define LL long long
#define CLR(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x))
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        LL shu,a,b,c,d,x,y;
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld",&shu,&a,&b,&c,&d,&x,&y);
        LL shu1=max(x,y),num=1,ans=shu;
        while(num<shu1)
            num*=2;
        LL x1=0,x2=num/2,x3=num,y1=0,y2=num/2,y3=num;
        while(num>=2)
        {
            if(x>=x1&&x<=x2&&y>=y1&&y<=y2)
            {
                ans*=a;
                x2=(x1+x2)/2,x3=(x1+x3)/2,y2=(y1+y2)/2,y3=(y1+y3)/2;
            }
            else if(x>=x1&&x<=x2&&y>y2&&y<=y3)
            {
                ans*=b;
                x2=(x1+x2)/2,x3=(x1+x3)/2,y1=y2,y2=(y2+y3)/2;
            }
            else if(x>x2&&x<=x3&&y>=y1&&y<=y2)
            {
                ans*=c;
                x1=x2,x2=(x2+x3)/2,y2=(y1+y2)/2,y3=(y1+y3)/2;
            }
            else if(x>x2&&x<=x3&&y>y2&&y<=y3)
            {
                ans*=d;
                x1=x2,x2=(x2+x3)/2,y1=y2,y2=(y2+y3)/2;
            }
            num/=2;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
}
